verbs.description: The Arizona Republic and the USA TODAY NETWORK [V: have] won a Pulitzer Prize for their reporting on President Donald Trump ’s proposed border wall .
[ARG0: The Arizona Republic and the USA TODAY NETWORK] have [V: won] [ARG1: a Pulitzer Prize] [ARGM-LOC: for their reporting on President Donald Trump ’s proposed border wall] .
